ok yeah my fault "sudo ln -s /usr/lib/firefox /usr/lib/mozilla-firefox"

yeah firefox looks for mozilla-firefox and that points to firefox which has everything

it should even be able to do pretty much anything you want like adding extensions or plugins because that is a system wide link so when you add plugins it will go to mozilla-firefox and then install them in firefox
